name: SplashDrop (Pedro_Silva2761)
description:
Hey there, a few disclaimers before you start your playthrough!

1. This is an indie dev pre-alpha game, so all your feedbacks are welcomed!

2. There are some bugs ahead! So please do hesitate to tell us about their existence in the comments below!

3. There are only 10 levels as of yet – but worry not, those levels will give us the necessary amount of feedback required for adding more in-game features and levels soon.

4. Like any other great game on its pre-alpha build, there are not many visual assets in the game at this stage of development

5. And as a final note: this current version doesn’t include a final level with a big bad evil boss and advanced level mechanics – but we’re confident you’re going to enjoy yourself playing through the levels!
